translation.en: -[bright orchestral music playing] -[chimes jingling]
-[robot whirring] -[elf yelps, groans]

-[in English] What took you so long? -[grunts]

Kate, we're gonna have so much fun.

-Bon voyage! Whoo-hoo! -[wormhole whooshes]
